results.content: This is a good introduction to the most basic elements of HTML. The step-by-step approach combined with multiple repetitions of page assembly provide a foundation for simple Web page construction.
results.content_html: This is a good introduction to the most basic elements of HTML. The step-by-step approach combined with multiple repetitions of page assembly provide a foundation for simple Web page construction.

Hi All, 
I've been on Udemy for quite a while now and have benefited immensely with this particular course on mastering web development. The instructor is precise yet happens to share all the required knowledge one would expect from a course like this. Extremely good course for all novices interested in getting at power with the industry at a fast pace. Happy Learning to all!!
